main event: A bright red-white object was sighted in Dayton, Ohio, on July 10, 1963, observed moving at high speed.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 3 minutes and was detected by ground radar., The pilot made a close pass at approximately 5000 ft but the object moved away abruptly., The object was described as circulating like an echo at a 0.5-degree elevation., Witness commented that the object produced a whistling noise and appeared bright in color., Conclusions considered the object as possibly a balloon, aircraft, missile, or astronomical object.
witness description: A 69-year-old male, auto-electric vet, electrical engineer
